title: Traders Launch Check website
description: Traders Launch, based in the United States and established in August 2023, is a futures proprietary trading firm offering a 1 Step program. Supported platforms include Quantower, Volumetrica Trading, IBKR, and NinjaTrader. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

forbidden_strategies: Traders must grow account by 1% buffer before first withdrawal.
Account paused if inactive for 1 month (Funded).

payout_policy.details: 80% or 55% profit split. 1% buffer required before withdrawals. No payout caps ($100 to $50k per transaction). Transition to Live Brokerage (IBKR, NinjaTrader, T3 Global) after evaluation.

forbidden_strategies: Traders must grow account by 1% buffer before first withdrawal.
Account paused if inactive for 1 month (Funded).

seo_content:
Traders Launch Technical Infrastructure

Traders Launch, based in the United States and established in August 2023, is a futures proprietary trading firm offering a 1 Step program. Supported platforms include Quantower, Volumetrica Trading, IBKR, and NinjaTrader. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
